description.p: Waiting is over... The new hoodies are here!

The new FSFE hoodies are produced only for those who will order them and will be self picked up only. They are based on the B&C KING Zipped Hood. As they are self picked-up, there are no shipping fee for orders that include one or more hoodies. You can combine them with other items from this shop for the same pick up location.

p.strong:
This item is for self-pick up at the FSFE booth at 38c3 only.
Pre-order will end 2024-11-11.

description.p: On the front the FSFE logo will be printed on the upper left side.
